name: popt
description: The popt library parses command line options.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: iconv
dependencies.description:
GNU libiconv provides an implementation of the iconv() function and the
iconv program for character set conversion.

dependent_to.name: babeltrace
dependent_to.description:
Babeltrace is a trace viewer and converter reading and writing the
Common Trace Format (CTF). Its main use is to pretty-print CTF traces
into a human-readable text output ordered by time.

dependent_to.name: openipmi
dependent_to.description:
The Open IPMI project aims to develop an open code base to allow access
to platform information using Intelligent Platform Management Interface
(IPMI).

dependent_to.name: authselect
dependent_to.description: Select authentication and indentity profile to use on the system.

dependent_to.name: rpm
dependent_to.description:
The RPM package manager https://github.com/rpm-software-
management/rpm/blob/master/INSTALL Note that debugedit is an additional
tool that *should* compile with adding libdw and elfutils, but the
library (as of 4.16.1.2) is being removed from rpm and will be put
somewhere else.

dependent_to.name: logrotate
dependent_to.description:
The logrotate utility is designed to simplify the administration of log
files on a system which generates a lot of log files.

dependent_to.name: distcc
dependent_to.description:
distcc is a program to distribute compilation of C or C++ code across
several machines on a network.

dependent_to.name: cryptsetup
dependent_to.description: Cryptsetup and LUKS - open-source disk encryption.

dependent_to.name: newt
dependent_to.description: A library for text mode user interfaces.

dependent_to.name: dbxtool
dependent_to.description: tool for managing dbx updates installed on a machine.

dependent_to.name: libuser
dependent_to.description: A user and group account administration library.

dependent_to.name: rsync
dependent_to.description: An open source utility that provides fast incremental file transfer.
